date: "2020-03-31"
title: 'Elo Ratings'
---

```{r pressure, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
d <- read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/predictions.csv")
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0), col.names = c("Rank","Team","Elo Rating","1st","2nd","3rd","4th","5th","6th+")) %>%
  add_header_above(c("Current" = 3, "2020 Projected Finish" = 6)) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>% column_spec(2, bold = T)
```
## Elo Ratings, Ten Team Era
```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
tenteam <- read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/elohistory.csv")
plot <- ggplot() + geom_line(data = tenteam, aes(Date, Elo, color = Team))
plot <- config(plot, displayModeBar = FALSE)
plot2 <- ggplotly(plot)
plot2 <- config(plot2, displayModeBar = FALSE)
plot2
```
